channel.title: Sprites
channel.description:
Ok well i think it's to do with sprites ive got a picture [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/rmsco0.jpg[/img]
Ok so i'm working on my client and stuff, but it has a "RuneScape" Picture there, how could i remove that, All the files in the sprites folder are .JAG files an you cannot open them :s
Please Help
Thanks, :D

item.title: Sprites
item.dc:creator: @shoopdawhoop shoopdawhoop
item.description:
@shoopdawhoop wrote:

Download Extension editor, and change the extensions of the .jag files to png
and then right click the “CHATBOX” sprite and click “Open with” and choose “Paint” and see if it has the RS logo, if it does, find a different CHATBOX sprite and replace it.

Read full topic

item.title: Sprites
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:3, topic:268570”]Put this into notepad and save it as a batch file.

@echo off ren *.jag *.pneg pause cls

Place the batch file into your sprites folder and run it. If you want to convert them back to jag, then just replace it with this:

@echo off ren *.pneg *.jag pause cls[/quote]Soz been on holiday and didn’t work it said press any key to continue i pressed enter, did nothing.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2009, 04:22:21 pm[/size][hr]and now it says The system cannot find the file specified.
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Sprites
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Put this into notepad and save it as a batch file.

@echo off ren *.jag *.pneg pause cls

Place the batch file into your sprites folder and run it. If you want to convert them back to jag, then just replace it with this:

@echo off ren *.pneg *.jag pause cls

Read full topic

item.title: Sprites
item.dc:creator: @twins_pk twins pk
item.description:
@twins_pk wrote:

i just “open in” Microsoft-Paint, then i edit the pictures and type SAVE-AS! theorginalename.JAG this has been awnserd before tho
